instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'src/index.css' with the CSS variables provided in the 'colors' section. Ensure both :root and .dark classes are populated.
3. FONTS: Add 'Outfit' and 'Inter' from Google Fonts in 'public/index.html' or via import in 'index.css'.

4. LAYOUT: For the Grading Page, use a split-screen layout. Left side (60-70%) for PDF Viewer, Right side (30-40%) for Grading Panel. Use 'h-screen' minus header height to prevent scrolling the whole page.
5. DASHBOARD: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy. Mix large summary cards with smaller stat cards. Use 'recharts' for the analytics.
6. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Override default radius to '0.5rem' or '0.75rem'. Use 'rounded-full' for primary action buttons.
7. MOTION: Add subtle entrance animations using 'framer-motion' (e.g., fade-in-up for cards). Use 'AnimatePresence' for modal/dialog transitions.
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text on Orange backgrounds is White. If using lighter orange, check contrast. Use 'data-testid' on all interactive elements.
9. PDF: Use a placeholder div or iframe if 'react-pdf-viewer' setup is too complex for the MVP, but structure the code to easily swap it in.
10. AUTH: Mock the Google OAuth flow visually if backend is not ready, but provide the UI for 'Sign in with Google'.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic AI designs. Use the 'Orange' accent boldly but strategically (buttons, active states, key metrics).
Do not use gradients for the main background. Keep it clean White or very light Gray.
Ensure the app is responsive, but prioritize Desktop experience for the Grading interface.
Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Do not use emojis in the UI.
